value.stringValue: IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c)="Advisory Services","012F0000000jL7IIAU", IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Board Evaluation","012F0000001EprCIAS", IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Coaching","012F0000001Eq75IAC", IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Executive Assessment","012F0000001Ep25", IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Executive Assessment with Coaching","0122A000001MOalQAG", IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Succession","012F0000001Ep20IAC", IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Succession with Coaching","012F0000001Ep20IAC", IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Team Effectiveness","012F0000001EpowIAC", IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="KSC","0122A000001MOavQAG", IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Leadership Accelerator","012F00000013aKiIAI",""))))))))))

value.stringValue: IF (TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Advisory",([Opportunity].Participant_Contact__c.LastName + " " + [Opportunity].Participant_Contact__c.FirstName), IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c)="Advisory Services",([Opportunity].Participant_Contact__c.LastName + " " + [Opportunity].Participant_Contact__c.FirstName), IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Coaching",([Opportunity].Participant_Contact__c.LastName + " " + [Opportunity].Participant_Contact__c.FirstName), IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Executive Assessment",([Opportunity].Participant_Contact__c.LastName + " " + [Opportunity].Participant_Contact__c.FirstName), IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Executive Assessment with Coaching",([Opportunity].Participant_Contact__c.LastName + " " + [Opportunity].Participant_Contact__c.FirstName), IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Team Effectiveness",("Offsite - " + [Opportunity].Participant_Contact__c.LastName),""))))))

IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Coaching","012F0000000jFxiIAE", IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Advisory Services","012F0000000jFxiIAE", IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Executive Assessment","012F0000001Ep2AIAS", IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Executive Assessment with Coaching","012F0000001Ep2AIAS", IF(TEXT([Opportunity].Engagement_Type__c) ="Team Effectiveness","012F0000000jFyCIAU","")))))
